I'm Trevor,

I specialize in Front End Development

View My Work

I Specialize In

Front End Development using HTML and styled with CSS, understanding of Sass & scss for simplified syntax, less code for finer detail

Concepting

Clients often know what they want, most don't know what they need. I create a visual presentation of layouts and benefits of how easily they can manage their businesses through their websites

HTML & CSS Markup

Once the layout is approved, it's my responsibility to write up clean, simple code with HTML and style with CSS and other CSS related frameworks, my job is to make it look easy

JavaScript Effects

Sometimes a nice presentable site is not enough to convince visitors of professionalism, dedication and ethics. Using some JavaScript can take some trial and error, but it can make a site go from "nice" to "wow, how did you do that?"

Happy Clients

The only way to keep them coming back is by giving them the best work, sales is the key success to every business. You never get to meet your developers but we get to appreciate their efforts. Grattitude goes a long way and making clients happy keeps food in the stomach

My Creative Process

All of my Websites are first created by looking at other work, seeing where I could improve it, write it down, and test the functionality

1

Discuss The Project

Making sure the client or the team are all on the same page

2

Brainstorming

Can I take what I have already made, and do better? Let's find out!

3

UI Planning

Once recieving the design or the apporval of one, it's straight to work, I like to style as I work so I can see the project come to life, it's all about making it exciting for yourself

4

Interaction

Does it work? Can it be done? Let's test it for the 1000th time and find out! Once we can confirm this, we can show the world your website!
